text: Hi all! I am an ML Engineer at a biomed company. Been using julia for microcontroller programming. Interested in TSML and Flux.jl

elements.text: Hi all! I am an ML Engineer at a biomed company. Been using julia for microcontroller programming. Interested in TSML and Flux.jl

text:
Welcome! That's really interesting to hear that you're using Julia for microcontroller programming. What sort of projects do you do? And how do you do it with Julia?

I only mainly have experience with Arduino (with the Arduino IDE, not Julia)
